## Lab sessions

### Lab Session 11


 * Produce forecasts using an appropriate benchmark method for student enrolments in Australia (as shown yesterday). Plot the results using `autoplot()`.
 * Produce forecasts using an appropriate benchmark method for Australian takeaway food turnover (`aus_retail`). Plot the results using `autoplot()`.
